actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to eliminate financings harmful to domestic U.S. employment.
subjects: Export-Import Bank of the United States

summary.text: Amends the Export - Import Bank Act of 1945 to eliminate the discretion of the Board of Governors in authorizing any loan or guarantee by prohibiting such loan or guarantee if it would have certain adverse economic effects upon the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to eliminate financings harmful to domestic U.S. employment.
